channel.title: Invention47.com | New server | Come check it out!
channel.description:
[center]
[center][url=http://invention47.com/webclient/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/1playnow.png[/img][/url] [url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/1website.png[/img][/url] [url=http://invention47.com/forums/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/1forums.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=18pt][b]Features[/b][/size] [center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
- Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill. - Updates Daily! - Different point systems to play with! - Perfect Clan Chat system. - Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from. - Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from. - Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users. - More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls. - Well coded chatting system. Ability to turn your chat offline or 'friends only' and guests will see you offline. Very useful for known people, who doesn't want to be disturbed. - Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there. - Online browser client, for people that don't want to download a browser client. - Deskop clients also are available, for people that doesn't want to play from browsers. - HighScores to battle for best ranks and titles, automatically updated every three hours. - Monthly community events and wars between player made clans. - Great and respectful administrators, who doesn't spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players. - Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators. - Many bosses that drop good stuff!
[size=18pt][b]Pictures[/b][/size] [center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
Here's an image of our winter themed home area! [url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled.png[/img][/url]
Many Fully working minigames like Barrows and Fight Cave! [url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled2.png[/img][/url] [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled3.png[/img][/url]
Great PK'ing areas like Mage Bank [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled4.png[/img][/url]
All fully recoded Skills! [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled5.png[/img][/url] [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled15.png[/img][/url]
Great Bosses and active staff! [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled6.png[/img][/url] [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled7.png[/img][/url] [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled10.png[/img][/url]
Special fully working areas like the Duel arena! [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled8.png[/img][/url]
(PK'ing outside of Mage bank) [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled9.png[/img][/url]
Many training spots like Yaks [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled11.png[/img][/url]
PKP store for the PK'ers [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled12.png[/img][/url]
Melee instructor gives you free starting weapons wich you can upgrade! [url=http://url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled13.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://url=http://invention47.com/forums/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/Untitled14.png[/img][/url]
Invention47 is running on a Dedicated server! [url=http://invention47.com/webclient/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/1playnow.png[/img][/url] [url=http://invention47.com/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/1website.png[/img][/url] [url=http://invention47.com/forums/][img]http://invention47.com/home/images/pics/1forums.png[/img][/url] See you in-game! - Deathbyu[/center]

item.title: Invention47.com | New server | Come check it out!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“igpxnaruto4, post:7, topic:537950”]Thanks man! were rising in players slowly!
And why did you resign ruby?[/quote]
Too much hassle. People were being idiots, I removed their posts, they cried for hours at me on IRC, PMs, Skype etc. Not worth it in my opinion.

Read full topic

What happened to Ruby’s mod
[/quote]
May i ask what that is?

Flame will probably infract but I have to ask…what happened to inventions 1-46? haha…

goo dluck though seriously I see you have some custom bosses which is always cool

Thanks, Adding more of them soon![/quote]

item.description:
@igpxnaruto4 wrote:

[center]

[center]

[/center]

[size=18pt][b]Features[/b][/size]

[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

  • Great Economy. You can earn money by doing every single skill.
  • Updates Daily!
  • Different point systems to play with!
  • Perfect Clan Chat system.
  • Every single skill is trainable. Total of twenty-one to choose from.
  • Custom, but decent Quests. Total of four to choose from.
  • Great combat system and triangle, which is quite important between danger zone users.
  • More then twenty custom Treasure Trail tasks. Start them by killing monsters and finding your own clue scrolls.
  • Well coded chatting system. Ability to turn your chat offline or ‘friends only’ and guests will see you offline. Very useful for known people, who doesn’t want to be disturbed.
  • Very creative home area. A lot of features can be found right there.
  • Online browser client, for people that don’t want to download a browser client.
  • Deskop clients also are available, for people that doesn’t want to play from browsers. - HighScores to battle for best ranks and titles, automatically updated every three hours.
  • Monthly community events and wars between player made clans.
  • Great and respectful administrators, who doesn’t spawn or cheat, but play fairly as other players.
  • Friendly, nice community and amazing moderators.
  • Many bosses that drop good stuff!

[size=18pt]Pictures[/size]
[center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

Here’s an image of our winter themed home area!

Many Fully working minigames like Barrows and Fight Cave!
